title: 12oz Stainless Steel Mug
text: Take your beverage on the go with this 12oz Stainless Tumbler. Details -BPA-free, double-wall, vacuum insulated 18/8 stainless steel. -Won't retain odors or tastes. -Flip-lock plastic lid. -Ergonomic open handle. -Passivated interior for corrosion protection. -Keeps drinks hot for up to six hours or cold for up to 12 hours. -Single-serve friendly for a cup of coffee. -KeurigÂ® Friendly. -Fits most cup holders. -Hand wash recommended, (lid is top rack dishwasher safe). -Do not microwave. -Holds 12 oz. -Gift Boxed. -Import. Laser Engraving. Matte Navy.
